name: CatCatch
description:
In the Arkanoid game CatCatch you have to find out all cats in the room. Use your high tech Ball to clear obstacles.Just like toys, chairs, a cup of coffee, or anythings in the room. Pay attention to the falling items. It can be helpful or useless.

Features

● Casual style and just relax
● 25 diversified levels.
● Various items (multiply the balls, expand paddle, etc.)
● You can almost clear anythings in the room.
● Cat Cat Cat...
